content.rendered:
Business class passengers are allowed to carry three  pieces of baggage, with a maximum of 24 kg each. The sum of the three dimensions of each piece must not exceed 158 cm.

Economy class passengers are allowed to carry two pieces of baggage with a maximum of 24 kg each the sum of the two dimensions of each piece must not exceed 158 cm.

 For more details visit : https://www.mea.com.lb/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Afriqiyah Airways Excess Baggage

Afriqiyah Airways Hand | Cabin Baggage
